class.name: sts_hardware_interface/STSHardwareInterface
class.description: Hardware interface for Feetech STS series servo motors (single or chain). Supports controlling single motors or chains of motors on the same serial bus. Provides complete diagnostics including position, velocity, load, voltage, temperature, current, and motion status for each motor. Supports all three operating modes: servo (position), velocity, and PWM. Uses SyncWrite for efficient multi-motor control.
